body: Oof, that's embarrassing. Thanks for investigating! I'll submit the fix (and see if I can write a test for it).

issue.body:
Also use the supplied current time instead of calling Instant.now().

I don't know how to meaningfully test this; there's so little going on that the test would essentially mirror the implementation.

Fixes #23429.

body:
A fix for this issue has been included in [Bazel 7.4.0 RC1](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases/tag/7.4.0rc1). Please test out the release candidate and report any issues as soon as possible.
If you're using Bazelisk, you can point to the latest RC by setting `USE_BAZEL_VERSION=7.4.0rc1`. Thanks!
